sentences.en: Abstract: To study germination characteristics of Mirabilis jalapa and Althaea rosea by soaking their dormant seeds.
sentences.cn: 摘要对紫茉莉和蜀葵休眠种子浸种处理研究其发芽特性。

sentences.en: After germination , stand in a light place and water when required.
sentences.cn: 发芽后移放在光亮的地方,有需要则浇水.

sentences.en: All of our grass seed is fresh date coded for maximum germination.
sentences.cn: 我们的草种全部是新鲜的日期编码最大发芽.

sentences.en: At the onset of germination, the hypocotyl elongates rapidly by cell enlargement.
sentences.cn: 萌发开始时, 下胚轴依靠细胞增大而迅速伸长.

sentences.en: Better germination is obtained if the seed is sown or drilled shortly after a shower.
sentences.cn: 下雨后即播种会更好促进发芽.

sentences.en: BTH had no direct inhibition to the spore germination and mycelial growth.
sentences.cn: BTH对 炭疽菌孢子萌发及菌丝生长均无直接抑制作用.

sentences.en: Excessive moisture is unfavourable for soybean germination.
sentences.cn: 水分过多对于大豆萌发是不利的.

sentences.en: In early days , because Christianity do not diffuse abroad, the Occident is on transition stage , society pattern still do not determine the nature and feudalism germination is developing.
sentences.cn: 初期阶段，由于基督教尚未广泛传播，西欧社会尚处于过渡阶段，社会模式还未定性，封建萌芽正在发展。

sentences.en: In this way, postmodernism might be seen as the delayed germination of an older seed, planted by artists like Marcel Duchamp, during modernism’s high noon of the 1920s and 1930s.
sentences.cn: 按这种理解，后现代主义可被看成一粒过往的种子延迟了的萌芽，这粒种子由马塞尔•杜尚等艺术家种在20世纪二三十年代现代主义的繁盛时期。

sentences.en: Seed germination may be suppressed if boronated fertilizers are mixed with the seed at planting time.
sentences.cn: 在播种期如以硼盐肥料与种子混合使用,会抑制种子萌芽.

sentences.en: She germination, bud, spring rain summer wind , akishimo, Dongxue.
sentences.cn: 她发芽, 含苞, 春雨,夏风, 秋霜,冬雪.

sentences.en: Spring gis coming, all things recovery, willow twigs of already germination, the swallow flew back from the south, depression of the earth again full of vitality.
sentences.cn: 春天到了，万物复苏，杨柳的嫩枝已经发芽了，燕子从南方飞了回来，萧条的大地又开始充满生机。

sentences.en: Temperature is most important for seed germination.
sentences.cn: 温度对种子的发芽至关重要.

sentences.en: The encroach process includes conglutination, spore germination, penetration, growth and host death.
sentences.cn: 它对寄主侵染过程包括粘附 、 子萌发 、 透虫体 、 内发育和致死.

sentences.en: The method of germination: selecting seeds, soaking and germinating.
sentences.cn: 发芽的方法: 选种 、 浸泡和发芽.

sentences.en: The optimum temperature for fungus growth aud spore germination is 25 - 28℃.
sentences.cn: 病菌生长的适宜温度为25—28℃,在pH4.5—10之间均能生长,孢子萌发的适宜温度为25—28℃.

sentences.en: The resultsof seed - germination tests corresponded to that of chromosomes damage.
sentences.cn: 发芽试验结果与染色体损伤结果相符.

sentences.en: The use of slide culture method compression rate of spore germination.
sentences.cn: 采用玻片压片培养法计算孢子萌发率.

sentences.en: There are many ways to accelerate germination of branches.
sentences.cn: 能使枝条快速催芽的方法有很多.

sentences.en: To study germination characteristics of Mirabilis jalapa and Althaea rosea by soaking their dormant seeds.
sentences.cn: 摘要对紫茉莉和蜀葵休眠种子浸种处理研究其发芽特性。

trans.tran_cn: 萌芽，发生，萌发，生芽，催芽
